content: Noncash stock-based compensation expense in SG&A was $0.9 million in the quarter and $6.6 million year-to-date. Research and development costs, excluding noncash stock-based compensation expense, were $7.1 million for the quarter and $19.8 million year-to-date. Noncash stock-based compensation expense in R&D were $0.2 million for the quarter and $1.1 million year-to-date.
